languages.text: "Мне жаль слабых и невинных, что стали жертвами чужих грехов... лучше сражаться на передовой, чем принимать те решения, что выпадают сенешалю".
"I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the misdoings of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."
languages.original_text: "Мне жаль слабых и невинных, что стали жертвами чужих грехов... лучше сражаться на передовой, чем принимать те решения, что выпадают сенешалю".

traits.locale_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the sins of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the sins of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the sins of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the sins of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我同情那些因他人之恶而受难的弱者与无辜之人……我宁可冲到前线战斗，也不愿意像总领那样，总是被迫做出那样的决定。”
languages.original_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the misdoings of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: “我同情那些因他人之恶而受难的弱者和无辜者……我宁可冲到前线战斗，也不愿意像总领那样，总是被迫做出那样的决定。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai grand-pitié des faibles et des innocents qui finissent par être victimes des méfaits des autres... Je préfère me battre à l'avant-garde plutôt que de devoir endosser les responsabilités d'un sénéchal. »
languages.original_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the misdoings of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai grand-pitié des faibles et des innocents qui finissent par être victimes des péchés des autres... Je préfère me battre à l'avant-garde plutôt que de devoir endosser les responsabilités d'un sénéchal. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bemitleide die Schwachen und Unschuldigen, die den Fehltritten anderer zum Opfer gefallen sind ... Es ist besser, an der Front zu kämpfen, als Entscheidungen zu treffen, die dem Truchsess zustehen."
languages.original_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the misdoings of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bemitleide die Schwachen und Unschuldigen, die den Sünden anderer zum Opfer gefallen sind ... Es ist besser, an der Front zu kämpfen, als Entscheidungen zu treffen, die dem Truchsess zustehen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「他者の過ちの犠牲となっている、弱く無垢な者たちを哀れに思う…家令長の責任を負って意思決定をするよりは、前線で戦う方が良い」
languages.original_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the misdoings of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: 「罪ある者の犠牲となっている、弱く無垢な者たちを哀れに思う…家令長の責任を負って意思決定をするよりは、前線で戦う方が良い」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Lo siento por los débiles e inocentes que son víctimas de las acciones ajenas... Es mejor luchar en primera línea que tener que tomar las decisiones correspondientes a un Senescal».
languages.original_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the misdoings of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento por los débiles e inocentes que son víctimas de los pecados ajenos... Es mejor luchar en primera línea que tener que tomar las decisiones correspondientes a un Senescal».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Başkalarının kötülüklerine kurban giden zayıf ve masumlara acıyorum. Kurunun yanında yaş da yanıyor. Seneşal gibi kararlar almak zorunda kalmaktansa ön cephede savaşmayı yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the misdoings of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."

traits.locale_text: "Başkalarının kötülüklerine kurban giden zayıf ve masumlara acıyorum. Kurunun yanında yaş da yanıyor. Seneşal gibi kararlar almak zorunda kalmaktansa ön cephede savaşmayı yeğlerim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I pity the weak and innocent who have fallen victim to the misdoings of others... It is better to fight on the front lines than to make the kind of decisions that fall to the Seneschal."
